PHRASE.LANG: X55 “Jungle Stalker” Torso Armor incorporates an integrated stealth field generator, sonic dampeners to ensure undetected movements and a synaptic interface that enhances muscle strength and reflexes. [#Legal]

Armure de Torse X55 "Jungle Stalker” a un générateur de terrain furtif intégré, amortisseurs acoustiques pour assurer des mouvements inaperçus et une interface synaptique qui améliore la force musculaire et les réflexes. [#Legal]

The core component of the X55 “Jungle Stalker” Stealth Combat Suit, this mechanized exoskeleton incorporates an integrated stealth field generator, sonic dampeners to ensure undetected movements and a synaptic interface that enhances muscle strength and reflexes. [#Legal]
